A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you are a SW fan\, please not watch this movie...just wait for bluray or dvd...or better yet..dont watch at all 


Now if you have seen this and have mixed feelings or didnt enjoy it\, please dont watch it a second time. The only way to tell Lucasfilm/Disney that fans are not happy--is by not contributing (more) money to watch this. I watched the previous Star Wars films in the cinema multiple times. Definitely more than once in the cinemas. This will be my first Star Wars movie that I will only watch once....

Still utterly devastated...
